title: Hot Air: The (Mostly) True Story of the First Hot-Air Balloon Ride
description: The first "manned" hot-air balloon is about to take off! But what are those noises coming from the basket?  Based on the (POSSIBLY) true report of a day in 1783, this is the story of (PERHAPS) the bravest collection of flyers the world has ever seen, as (SORT OF) told to Marjorie Priceman.
author: Marjorie Priceman
